name: APIConsumerKPV

eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner

parameterDecorators.name: previousOwner

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner

functionDecorators.name: acceptOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

functionDecorators.name: fulfill
functionDecorators.description: Receive the response in the form of uint256.

functionDecorators.name: requestVolumeData
functionDecorators.description: Create a Chainlink request to retrieve API response, find the target data, then multiply by 1000000000000000000 (to remove decimal places from data).

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawLink
functionDecorators.description: Allow withdraw of Link tokens from the contract.
